intro: Psychotria stenoclada, commonly known as the narrow-leaved Psychotria, is a species of flowering plant in the Rubiaceae family. It is native to tropical regions of South America, particularly Brazil and Peru. The plant is characterized by its small, elliptical leaves and clusters of small, white to pale green flowers. It produces small, berry-like fruits that are typically green when mature. Psychotria stenoclada is often found in humid, shaded environments within tropical forests.
